items.sentence: I thought that Tom would be there, and he was.
I thought that Tom might be there, and he was.
I hope that Tom understands how grateful I am.
Let's hope that Tom doesn't decide to do that.
Have you decided who you're going to vote for?
That's the kind of car that I'd like to drive.
Go home and come back when you've calmed down.
Tom and his friends often play games together.
Tom said that he was going to be here tonight.
Tom published his first novel three years ago.
